name: Billion Hands Technology Pvt. Ltd
overview:
Billion Hands Technology is an outsourced product development company that provides end-to-end software solutions for domains that demand high-end technology e.g.

  • Online/mobile based Gaming (MMOs)
  • Digital Media
  • Smartphone applications
  • Decision Support Systems
  • TechDriver

n addition, Billion Hands also provide 24/7 cost effective IT infrastructure management and application support through its TechDriver offering, which consists of combination of tools for system monitoring, alerting, ticketing workflow etc.

Founded by young entrepreneurs in 2009 Billion Hands Technology vow expertise from industry experts having worked with some of the leading names of the industry to foster growth and excellence.

At Billion Hands, focus is on applying right technology to gain maximum returns. The team of hands-on and highly experienced technologists help create frameworks that can build robust applications with sound-n-flexible architecture. This technology edge makes Billion Hands an ideal development partner for businesses wanting to concentrate on their core activities.

With an eminent presence in all segments of Service spectrum, including Gaming, Media, Mobile applications, Infrastructure management and Finance; Billion Hands has evolved as a Knowledge based and Client Oriented Organization accentuating towards excellence. A combined program together with innovation and technological excellence helps it proactively respond to demands. Specialties Online/Mobile based Gaming, Online,SMS,Slot game software and Server based games ranging from Poker, Casino, Bingo,Lottery and many more., Smartphone Apps, Digital Media, Decision Support Systems, Remote Infrastructure Management

offices.address1: 4th Floor, 'A' Wing, Butte Patil Prestige, Revenue Colony, 1170/27 Shivaji Nagar
